name: node-red-teknoir-configure-devices
description: A set of nodes to configure IoT devices on the Teknoir Platform

scripts.debug: NAMESPACE=demonstrations nodemon --watch src -e html,js,yaml --exec 'rm -vfr ./node_modules/node-red-teknoir-configure-devices/src/* && cp -Rv ./src/* ./node_modules/node-red-teknoir-configure-devices/src && yarn install && yarn workspace debug start-local'
